Sentencas: A-site nonstoichiometric electrolytes (La0.95Sr0.05)(x)Ga0.9Mg0.1O3-delta (LSGM, x = 0.97, 1.00, 1.03), and their composites Ce0.8Nd0.2O1 9 (NDC)-LSGM, were synthesized and investigated.
Titulo: Nonstoichiometric (La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ electrolytes and Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9-(La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ composite electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The nonstoichiometry efficiently enhanced the total conductivity of LSGM electrolyte, and the A-site deficient composition showed the highest total conductivity above 550 degrees C (sigma(t,LSGM(x=0.97)) = 0.880 S m(-1) > sigma(t,LSGM(x=1.03)) = 0.808 S m(-1) > sigma(t,LSGM(x=1.00)) = 0.582 S m(-1) at 600 degrees C).
Titulo: Nonstoichiometric (La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ electrolytes and Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9-(La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ composite electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cubic fluorite and perovskite structures were adopted by all the composites.
Titulo: Nonstoichiometric (La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ electrolytes and Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9-(La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ composite electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The LSGM additive significantly promoted the grain growth of the composite electrolyte.
Titulo: Nonstoichiometric (La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ electrolytes and Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9-(La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ composite electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The grain boundary conductivities of the composite electrolytes were more or less 5-10 times higher than that of NDC electrolyte at 500 degrees C.
Titulo: Nonstoichiometric (La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ electrolytes and Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9-(La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ composite electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The optimum A-site nonstoichiometry was found to be x = 0.97 in composite electrolytes.
Titulo: Nonstoichiometric (La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ electrolytes and Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9-(La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ composite electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study provides a possible route to design high performance single phase or composite electrolytes for SOFCs.
Titulo: Nonstoichiometric (La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ electrolytes and Ce0.8Nd0.2O1.9-(La0.95Sr0.05)xGa0.9Mg0.1O3-δ composite electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells
